## LinkedList.has() method

Returns a boolean indicating whether an element with the specified value exists in a linked list or not.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(element: T): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T | The value to test for presence in the linked list. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
